Title: Requires property/casualty insurance policies to state the types and causes of damage that are covered by such policy
Summary: Requires property/casualty insurance policies to state the types and causes of damage that are covered by such policy; requires such information to be provided at or near the beginning of such policy.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring property/casualty insurance policies to state the types and causes of damage that are covered by such policy
